scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && docker-compose -f docker-compose-es.yml up -d && npm run start:dev"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start:prod"
